header: Egyptâ€™s King Will Be Chopped Down like a Cedar Tree

verse: Eleven years after King Jehoiachin and the rest of us had been led away as prisoners to Babylonia, the Lord spoke to me on the first day of the third month. He said:
Ezekiel, son of man, tell the king of Egypt and his people that I am saying:
King of Egypt, now listen to what I, the Lord God, am saying about that tree:
